sentences.sContent: Gaelic is still spoken in Ireland by a tiny minority.
sentences.sCn: 爱尔兰仍有极少数人在说盖尔语。

sentences.sContent: ...Open data sharers are still in the minority in many fields...
...Among the minority of studies that have reported advantages of single-sex schooling...
...How does Amy Wilkins of the Education Trust view minority students' failure to get a degree...
...State and federal governments could sharpen that focus everywhere by broadly publishing minority graduation rates...
...has boosted the proportion of so-called under-represented minority students in entering freshman classes from 8% to 13%...
...was justifiably proud of Bowdoin's efforts to recruit minority students...
...As the minority population grows in the United States...
...often in minority communities located near large industrial polluters...

synos.tran: 少数民族；少数派；未成年

phrases.pCn: 少数民族语言；少数人的语言；小语种

words.tran: 未成年的；次要的；较小的；小调的；二流的
未成年人；小调；副修科目

trans.tranOther: a small group of people or things within a much larger group
